channel.title: Hades Inferno (First Model)
channel.description:
Alright so this is my first model and I used prims i want some your most harsh words if it's bad so here it is

item.title: Hades Inferno (First Model)
item.dc:creator: @killer90210 killer90210

@killer90210 wrote:

I don’t know how to trace so lol and thanks i plan on making more

item.title: Hades Inferno (First Model)
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:9, topic:334722”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=431114.msg3165318#msg3165318 date=1269960256]

do not rely too much on prims or it will hold you back.

Seriously?
[/quote]I think he means it will hold you back from tracing.[/quote]
Well there was JJones…
But even so, I’m with prims

Read full topic

item.description:

Does anyone know how to use the knife tool and can explain it?

item.title: Hades Inferno (First Model)
item.dc:creator: @man_killerx man_killerx
item.description:
@man_killerx wrote:

Bah I do about 60% Freehand. 20% Prims, 5% Trace, And 15% Colouring.

Also I said “Do not rely too much” So try not to refrain from reading.

Read full topic

item.title: Hades Inferno (First Model)
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:3, topic:334722”][quote author=man_killerx link=topic=431114.msg3165038#msg3165038 date=1269921175]
Try to shape your prims, Also do not rely too much on prims or it will hold you back.

That is all I have to say atm about it I will update what I think later or something. Also Poly overkill.
[/quote]

Please, refrain from telling someone to not rely on primitives. When in fact, the legit modeling professionals use primitives themselves. They provide an excellent structure to work from.

@Model, try shaping them a bit better, Use the segement, knife, and move tools a bit.[/quote]
Agreed. Prims all the way, maybe a freehand like 5% on a model. Currently, your model stabs. Make it sharp so u can cut too!

Read full topic

item.title: Hades Inferno (First Model)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“man_killerx, post:2, topic:334722”]Try to shape your prims, Also do not rely too much on prims or it will hold you back.

That is all I have to say atm about it I will update what I think later or something. Also Poly overkill.[/quote]

Please, refrain from telling someone to not rely on primitives. When in fact, the legit modeling professionals use primitives themselves. They provide an excellent structure to work from.

@Model, try shaping them a bit better, Use the segement, knife, and move tools a bit.

Read full topic
